article: one of the biggest challenges tony blair will face as a middle east envoy of the international community is arab anger over the wars in iraq and lebanon , and the suspicion that he is a lackey of u.s. president george w. bush .
abstract: arab anger over the iraq lebanon wars could make his job difficult as mideast envoy
